properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 7:41PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the Black Warrior River At
Oliver Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the lower Black Warrior River following the
heavy rainfall on Thursday...however they are not expected to be
as high as forecast at Oliver Lock and Dam. The Flood Warning has
been cancelled for Oliver Lock and Dam but remains in effect
for Selden Lock and Dam.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 7:30 PM Friday the stage was 92.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 90.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 98.5 feet by
early Monday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 98.0 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood.
* Impact...At 94.0 feet...Some secondary roads in the area begin to
flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
